result.purpose: Responsible for the consumer service in a wallet application, handling configuration, initialization, and dependency injection.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, utilizing dependency injection for better separation of concerns and easier testing.

cmd/consumer/config.go.purpose: Defines configuration structures for a consumer service in a wallet application.

cmd/consumer/main.go.purpose: Main entry point for the consumer application, initializing configuration, logging, and starting the app.

cmd/consumer/wire.go.purpose: This file sets up dependency injection for the consumer application using Google Wire.

cmd/consumer/wire_gen.go.purpose: Generates dependency injection code for the consumer application using Wire.
